elements.name: choosing Name(A-Z) when the ordering is already A-Z will keep the current ordering

steps.name: I am on the all items page
The ordering is A-Z
I click on the ordering dropdown
Click Name(A-Z)
The item ordering should be A-Z

elements.name: Choosing Name(A-Z) when the ordering is not A-Z will change the ordering to A-Z

steps.name: I am on the all items page
The ordering is Z-A
I click on the ordering dropdown
Click Name(A-Z)
The item ordering should be A-Z

elements.name: Choosing Name(Z-A) when the ordering is not Z-A will change the ordering to Z-A

steps.name: I am on the all items page
The ordering is A-Z
I click on the ordering dropdown
Click Name(Z-A)
The item ordering should be Z-A

elements.name: Choosing Name(Z-A) when the ordering is Z-A will keep the current ordering

steps.name: I am on the all items page
The ordering is Z-A
I click on the ordering dropdown
Click Name(Z-A)
The item ordering should be Z-A

elements.name: Choosing Price(L-H) when the ordering is A-Z will change the ordering to Price(L-H)

steps.name: I am on the all items page
The ordering is A-Z
I click on the ordering dropdown
Click Price(L-H)
The item ordering should be Price(L-H)

elements.name: Choosing Price(L-H) when the ordering is already Price(L-H) will keep the current ordering

steps.name: I am on the all items page
The ordering is Price(L-H)
I click on the ordering dropdown
Click Price(L-H)
The item ordering should be Price(L-H)

elements.name: Choosing Price(H-L) when the ordering is A-Z will change the ordering to Price(H-L)

steps.name: I am on the all items page
The ordering is A-Z
I click on the ordering dropdown
Click Price(H-L)
The item ordering should be Price(H-L)

elements.name: Choosing Price(H-L) when the ordering is already Price(H-L) will keep the current ordering

steps.name: I am on the all items page
The ordering is Price(H-L)
I click on the ordering dropdown
Click Price(H-L)
The item ordering should be Price(H-L)

name: Ability to order items on page

elements.name: Starting from the login page
Standard user tries to login

steps.name: Standard user enters the correct username and password
The user will be redirected to the product page

elements.name: Starting from the login page
Locked out user tries to login

steps.name: Locked out user  enters the correct username and password
The user will be shown a message that they are locked out

elements.name: Starting from the login page
Problem user tries to login

steps.name: Problem user enters the correct username and password
The user will be redirected to the product page

elements.name: Starting from the login page
Performance glitch user tries to login

steps.name: Performance glitch user enters the correct username and password
The user will be redirected to the product page

elements.name: Starting from the login page
User enters an incorrect username or password

steps.name: User enters the incorrect username or password
The user will be displayed an error message

elements.name: Starting from the login page
User enters no username or password

steps.name: User enters no incorrect username or password
The user will be displayed an error message

elements.name: User accesses the nav bar

steps.name: : The user is logged in

elements.name: The user wants to log out

steps.name: : The user clicks on the logout button
: The user should be directed to the login page

name: Clicking on product should open the expanded product page

elements.name: User accesses the nav bar

steps.name: : The user is logged in
: The user has at least 1 item in the basket
